welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hornsby Bend, a charming and quaint city in the United States! Known for its scenic beauty and friendly community, we invite you to explore and discover all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Austin-Bergstrom International Airport, where most domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal is a smaller terminal at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the 'AUS Free WiFi' network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Austin Executive Airport serves all commercial flights and provides various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Austin Executive Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to stay connected.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Marcos Regional Airport is a small, modern building with basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at San Marcos Regional Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights, offering a more luxurious and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained at the information desk.
